front.title: Content Distribution Network Interconnection (CDNI) Publisher Use

abstract.t: Content publishers are increasingly using multiple CDNs to publish content to the consumers. It is important to take into account their specific requirements with respect to workflow restrictions with respect to content licensing rules. Also, certain content applications have specific delivery requirements that need to considered while negotiating or signaling inter-CDN arrangements. This contribution highlights some of these use cases to help motivate discussion.
